name: 2014 DELUXE PACKAGE
description:
We just found a lost box of 12 Fall issues that we thought we were SOLD OUT of!  We're so happy!

Now... we can offer this FANTASTIC package!

DELUXE 

PACKAGE INCLUDES:

Sweet Paul #12 - Spring 2013
Sweet Paul #13 - Summer 2013
Sweet Paul #14 - Fall 2013
Sweet Paul #15 - Holiday 2013
Sweet Paul Kids Issue #1 - 2013

This package is available in the United States only.  US domestic shipping is included in the package price.

name: Sweet Paul Annual Subscription - 4 issues
description:
Subscribe today to Sweet Paul Magazine and make sure you don't miss a single page!


For gift subscriptions, be sure to change the shipping address when you're making your payment via Paypal.

SELECT THE ISSUE YOU'D LIKE YOUR SUBSCRIPTION TO START WITH BELOW!   

Holiday Issue Start includes: Holiday 2013, Spring 2014, Summer 2014, Fall 2014

Spring Issue Start includes: Spring 2014, Summer 2014, Fall 2014, Holiday 2014

name: Sweet Paul #15 - Holiday/Winter 2013
description:
Happy Holidays!  Merry Christmas! 

Here's a glimpse at what's in the issue:
Blue Christmas
Winter Cooking
Our BEST Holiday Desserts!
A Country Christmas
Cool Gift Wrapping
Jewel Toned Food
Nordic Cookies
Fantastic Mr. Finch
Tinsel Trading
Inspired by Nature
Bee's wax

name: Sweet Paul Magazine Kids Issue
description:
Regular Price: $18.00 - Save $5 Today!

We are beyond excited to be releasing this SPECIAL extra issue this year!  As you might have guessed, this issue is ALL ABOUT KIDS! We've got those stylish and easy recipes and crafts that you expect from Sweet Paul but witha decidedly kid focus.

Features include:
- DIY Science Projects at Home
- An Over the Rainbow Party
- Circus Paper Crafts
- Kid Approved Food
- ABC's
- An interview with dollmaker, Mimi Kirchner

And much much more!


Note to subscribers: This is a special 5th out-of-cycle issue.  This issue is not included in your annual subscription.

name: Sweet Paul Magazine #12
description:
Sweet Paul Magazine - Spring 2013 

NEW Lower cover price of $18!

Pre-order your Spring Sweet Paul today!  This stunning Spring-fresh issue includes:

Travel Guide Paris
Lotta Jansdotter's new line of china
Spring Cakes
Wax flowers
Old China, new Ways
Spring Salads
Easter
Cocktails
Smoked Fish
Violets
Meet Mrs Meyers
Crafty Baskets
Textile Design from South Africa

We expect to ship magazines by the week of March 18.

Sweet Paul is a small and growing publication.  We produce a very high quality magazine with a small staff in small quantities and unfortunately printing and shipping costs are high. (The USPS recently raised shipping prices particularly for international mail 41% which makes it a very premium price)  We produce the magazine because there is a great demand for the print version.  If the pricing doesn't work for you we would love for you to read our online version!  I love you all!  xx Sweet Paul

description:
We're so excited about our Holiday issue!  Pre-order your WHOLESALE boxes today!  We expect to ship in early November for delivery prior to November 15.

We sell Sweet Paul in multiples of 12.  Shipping is included in the wholesale pricing.  MSRP is $18-$24.  No returns accepted at this time, all sales are final.

For CANADA and INTERNATIONAL orders use the drop-down option menu to select appropriate pricing.

name: Sweet Paul Hot Glue Gun Temporary Tattoo by Tattly
description: Sweet Paul is known for his CRAFTASTIC hot glue gun tattoo on his arm... we thought you might like to let your crafter flag fly and show the world your love for crafting with a temporary tattoo version!  The tattoos are made by Tattly and are 2"x2".  Made in the USA.

name: Sweet Paul Magazine #10
description: SOLD-OUT! Consider purchasing from our partner, Mill Mercantile: Mill Mercantile: Click here to buy Sweet Paul Magazine, Fall 2012! Chocked full of food and crafts... and of course beautiful photographs! Features include: Chocolate!, DIY Halloween Masks, Fall Food, Mushroom Crafts, Apple Recipes and much more! We produce a very high quality magazine with a small staff in small quantities and unfortunately printing and shipping costs are high.
